name: War Wyvern
description: The War Wyvern is a large dragon with a powerful physique, capable of flying at high speeds and exhibiting impressive physical resilience.
memorable: Its ability as a Siege Monster allows it to deal double damage to structures, making it formidable in siege warfare.
goals: Typically seeks physical dominance in combat, often engaging in battles using its mobility and poison attacks.
relations: Can be related to other dragons or wyverns and may serve as a powerful adversary to adventurers.
environment: Often found in battlefields or areas involving fortifications, utilizing its flight and siege capabilities.
strengths: High hit points and multiple attacks allow it to dominate in melee and ranged combat.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma limit its strategic capabilities beyond straightforward engagement.
attacks: Utilizes multiple attacks including a powerful bite, claws, and a venomous stinger, each capable of significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Spit Venom, which allows it to deal heavy poison damage at range.
senses: Possesses passive perception of 15, enhancing its situational awareness in combat.
skills: Excels in athletics and has a good perception, aiding its combat effectiveness.
additional_information: Utilizes its claws to grapple and restrain foes.
Effective against fortifications due to its Siege Monster ability.
Can attack from the air, maintaining a safe distance from melee combatants.
Has a notable Constitution saving throw bonus, increasing its durability.
Ranged poison attack can significantly damage enemies.
